attributes.action: undertake to reduce the number of Members of Parliament by at least 50% immediately on ratification of the Lisbon Treaty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Lisbon Treaty integrates all EU countries further into the EU fold.  It is then, now appropriate, that while more and more of our political decisions are being made in Brussels, numbers of our MPs and ministers should be smaller.  As a first step at least one half of the 600 or so present members of parliament should go.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
